name: CreativeSignal Testimonials
author: CreativeSignal Team

sections.description:
CreativeSignal Testimonial allows you to present customer testimonials on your website in a sidebar through CreativeSignal Testimonials Widget or in a page or post through the short-code.

Features:

  1. Add testimonials to your website.
  2. Simple interface to enter and edit testimonials.
  3. Display testimonials through Sidebar (Widget) or Short-code.
  4. Fade-in and fade-out animation with short-code.
  5. Scroll animation with sidebar (Widget).

PS: For future reference how to use the plugin, check out our documentation here: http://creative-signal.com/wordpress/wordpress-plugins/creativesignal-testimonials
sections.installation:
Setting up CreativeSignal Testimonials is pretty easy, just follow instructions below:

  1. Download the installation package.
  2. In the WordPress back-end, go to Plugins > Add New and select Upload.
  3. Install and active the plug-in.
  4. Go to CS testimonials menu item.
  5. Add one or more testimonials to your website.
  6. Go in Appearance > Widgets and add the CreativeSignal Testimonials Widget to one of your sidebars. Adjust options.
  7. Paste [cs-testimonials] in some of your pages/posts to display all testimonials.
